get.description: Returns a list of events.

parameters.name: UpdatedSince
parameters.description:
Filter by events updated since a specified time.
Supported date formats are ISO YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss or .net ticks representation of the UTC datetime.

parameters.name: MatterId
parameters.description: Filter by events assigned to a specific MatterId.

parameters.name: ExcludeDeletedEvents
parameters.description: Filter out any events that have been deleted, default: false

parameters.name: From
parameters.description:
Filter events from a specified UTC date and time.
Defaults to the UTC datetime of the request.
Dates should be provided in ISO format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.

parameters.name: To
parameters.description:
Filter events to a specified UTC date and time.
If no datetime is specified all future events will be returned.
Dates should be provided in ISO format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.

get.description:
Returns a paginated list of matter types based on search criteria. Deleted matter types are not included.

Note: If no `Location` is provided, all matter types from all locations will be returned.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Searches for partial match on matter type name

parameters.name: Location
parameters.description: Return matter types from a specific location. In the US API this is the ANSI 2 letter state code (e.g. IL, NY). In the AU API this is shorthand state code (e.g. NSW, ACT, etc)

parameters.name: Category
parameters.description: Return matter types from a specific category.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
Return matter types by category type (i.e. MatterType or LeadType).
            
Possible values: Matter Type = 0, Lead Type = 1.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a paged collection of 'MatterTypeInfo' objects.

get.description: Returns a list of matters. To return leads, set the `isLead` search option to true.

parameters.name: Search
parameters.description:
Filter matters by specified search term.
This field is wide reaching, it is used to search by clients, othersides, description and matter numbers.

parameters.name: MatterTypeId
parameters.description: Filter by matter type identifier.

parameters.name: ContactId
parameters.description: Filter by the contact identifier.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
Filter by current status of the matter.

Possible values: Open, Pending, Closed, Deleted or Cancelled.

parameters.name: IsLead
parameters.description:
Boolean flag to return 'Leads'. This is false by default.

A Lead is a potential matter that has not yet been converted to a full matter. The data structure of a lead is similar to a matter, but with some small variances.

parameters.name: UpdatedSince
parameters.description:
Filter by matters updated since a specified time (.net ticks representation of the UTC datetime). Cannot be used in conjunction with `LastUpdated`.

This field will not be supported in future, please use LastUpdated instead.

parameters.name: LastUpdated
parameters.description: Filter by last updated date of matter. Cannot be used in conjunction with `UpdatedSince`.

parameters.name: Sort
parameters.description: Available fields: status, lastUpdated

parameters.name: Fields
parameters.description: Available fields: items, tags

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a paged collection of 'Matter' objects.

post.description:
Creates a new matter.
            
Note: This endpoint can also be used to create a `Lead`.

When creating a `Lead` you MUST remember to set a valid lead specific `matterTypeId` field (see field description below for more details) and set the `isLead` field to true.

The `clientRole` and `otherSideRole` are optional and cannot be identical. They will be set to the default role(s) for the specified matter type - if not provided.

put.description:
Updates a specified matter.
            
The following actions are currently not supported:
            
- `clientIds` cannot be modified
            
- `otherSideIds` cannot be modified

-  `Matter` cannot be converted back to `Lead`

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the matter to be updated.

400.description: When an unsupported request is made.

403.description: When the authenticated account does not have access to the matter.

patch.description:
Patches a specified matter.
            
Note: This endpoint can also be used to update a `Lead`, convert `Lead` to `Matter` and change the `Lead`/`Matter` type.
            
See `Matters` documentation for more details on how to use this.

The following actions are not supported:

- `items` cannot be updated where either `clientIds` and/or `otherSideIds` are being updated
            
- `items` cannot be updated when converting a `Lead` to `Matter` or changing the `Lead`/`Matter` type
            
- `clientRole` cannot be updated, unless converting a `Lead` to `Matter` or changing the `Lead`/`Matter` type
            
- `Matter` cannot be converted back to `Lead`
            
- `splitOriginatingStaffSettings` cannot be updated without also providing `originatingStaffIds` in the same PATCH request
            
- `personAssistingStaffIds` cannot contain `personAssistingStaffId`
            
- `originatingStaffIds` cannot contain `originatingStaffId`
            
- If split originating staff settings are enabled, `originatingStaffIds` and `originatingStaffId` cannot be updated

patch.description:
Cancels a subscription using the supplied cancellation request.

Supported cancellation types:
* PeriodEnd - Cancel subscription at the end of the billing cycle
* Immediate - Cancel subscription immediately
* Date - Cancel at specified 'CancelAt' date

If not supplied, PeriodEnd is used and the subscription is cancelled at the end of the billing cycle.

Default behaviour:
* If the subscription is trialing a tier, the tier is reverted to the previous tier at the end of the trials duration. This is only supported with PeriodEnd CancellationType.
* If the subscription is trialing add-on(s), the add-on is removed at the end of the trials duration. This is only supported with PeriodEnd CancellationType.

Important considerations:
* If 'cancelSubscription' is specified and set to 'true', the default behaviour specified above is ignored and the cancellation is applied directly on the subscription.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the subscription

200.description: When request is successful. Returns a 'CancellationResponse' object.

400.description: When an unsupported request is made.

404.description: When subscription with specified id does not exist.

500.description: When an error occurs while canceling the subscription.

patch.description:
Resumes a subscription that is pending cancellation or is already canceled.

If the subscription is in a CANCELED state:
 * An immediate charge for the subscription amount will be trigered.
 * If the charge is unsuccessful, the subscription will be moved to PASTDUE status until a charge is successful.
 * If all charge retry attempts fail, the subscription will be become CANCELED once again.
If the subscription is in the PENDING cancellation state:
 * The existing billing cycle will remain in place

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the subscription

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a 'Link' object.

400.description: When an unsupported request is made.

404.description: When subscription with specified id does not exist.

500.description: When an error occurs while resuming the subscription.

User must belong to the specified account.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the user to be removed.

400.description: When an unsupported request is made.

403.description: When the user is not associated to the specified account.

post.description:
Creates a user.

Sends an email with a generated password if the password is missing.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the user to be created.

400.description: When user or password validation fails.

post.description:
Resends an invitation email with a temporary password for the specified user.

The user must exist and belong to the specified account when specifying id.
Optionally invite a user using a email address instead of user id. Use a default id of all zeros when posting email address payload.
Email address invites are only available to client credential grants.

202.description: When request is accepted. Returns a hypermedia 'Link' object of the user to be invited.

400.description: When an unsupported request is made.

403.description: When the user is not associated to the specified account.

get.description: Returns the available event types.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns the available event types.

400.description: When an unsupported request is made.

get.description: Returns existing webhook subscriptions.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns existing webhook subscriptions.

400.description: When an unsupported request is made.

post.description: Creates a new webhook subscription with the specified subscription details.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns the new webhook subscriptions.

400.description: When an unsupported request is made.

get.description: Returns the webhook subscription.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns the webhook subscriptions.

400.description: When an unsupported request is made.

put.description: Updates a webhook subscription with the specified subscription details.

200.description: When request is successful. Returns updated webhook subscriptions.

400.description: When an unsupported request is made.

403.description: When webhook subscription with specified id is not associated with authenticated client.

404.description: When the webhook subscription is not found.

delete.description: Deletes and unsubscribes from the specified webhook subscription.

200.description: When request is successful. Deletes the webhook subscription.

400.description: When an unsupported request is made.

post.description:
Notifies a webhook subscription with a 'noop' event type.
            
Used for testing purposes.

200.description: When request is successful. Notifies the webhook subscription.

400.description: When an unsupported request is made.

type.description:
Type of the activity.

Possible values: Fixed = '0', Time = '1', Expense = '2'

isBillable.description: True if the activity is billable.

rateType.description:
The activity rate type.

Possible values: UseDefaultStaffRate = '0', OverrideRateForAllStaff = '1', OverrideRatePerStaff = '2'

rate.description:
Rate of the activity in dollars.

If set, rate type must be OverrideRateForAllStaff

quantity.description:
Quantity of the activity. This is the default value used when creating an expense or time-based fee.

For type 'Expense', this field represents the quantity of the expense in units.
For type 'Time', this field represents the duration of in minutes, divided by 100,
e.g. for 1 hour duration, quantity is 0.6, which is 60 minutes divided by 100.

Applies only for 'Time' and 'Expense' types. Not applicable for activity type 'Fixed'.

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is GST inclusive, otherwise GST exclusive. Only applicable in AU.

GST inclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount - GST, Amount inc. GST = Amount.

GST exclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount, Amount inc. GST = Amount + GST.

taxExempt.description: Sets tax rate to 0 for the entry (e.g. expense).

taxZeroRated.description: Indicates the entry is zero-rated for tax purposes. Mutually exclusive with other tax settings.

taxOutOfScope.description: Indicates the entry is out of scope for tax purposes. Mutually exclusive with other tax settings.

isDeleted.description: True if the activity is deleted.

updatedByUserId.description:
Unique identifier of the user updating the activity.

This field is reserved for server-to-server operations.

Type of the activity.

Possible values: Fixed = '0', Time = '1', Expense = '2'

code.description: Code of the activity. Cannot be longer than 20 characters.

Possible values: UseDefaultStaffRate = '0', OverrideRateForAllStaff = '1', OverrideRatePerStaff = '2'

rate.description:
Rate of the activity in dollars.

If set, rateType must be OverrideRateForAllStaff

quantity.description:
Quantity of the activity. This is the default value used when creating an expense or time-based fee.

For type 'Expense', this field represents the quantity of the expense in units.
For type 'Time', this field represents the duration of in minutes, divided by 100,
e.g. for 1 hour duration, quantity is 0.6, which is 60 minutes divided by 100.

Applies only for 'Time' and 'Expense' types. Not applicable for activity type 'Fixed'.

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is tax inclusive, otherwise tax exclusive. Only applicable in AU and UK regions.

Tax inclusive means: Amount exc. tax = Amount - Tax, Amount inc. tax = Amount.

Tax exclusive means: Amount exc. tax = Amount, Amount inc. tax = Amount + Tax.

taxExempt.description:
True if the activity is exempt from tax.

This field is mutually exclusive with TaxZeroRated and TaxOutOfScope.

taxZeroRated.description:
True if the activity is zero-rated for tax purposes. Only supported in UK regions.

This field is mutually exclusive with TaxOutOfScope and TaxExempt.

taxOutOfScope.description:
True if the activity is out of scope for tax purposes. Only supported in UK regions.

This field is mutually exclusive with TaxZeroRated and TaxExempt.

The type of the event.

Possible values: Non Recurring Event = 0, Recurring Pattern Series = 1, Single Recurring Occurrence = 2, Modified Recurring Occurrence = 3, Deleted Recurring Occurrence = 4

offset.description:
Offset of the reminder.

Value must be between 0 and 100.

offsetTypeId.description:
Offset Type id of the reminder.

Possible values:
    1 = Minute
       
    2 = Hourly
            
    3 = Daily
            
    4 = Weekly
            
    5 = Monthly

isAllDayReminder.description: Boolean flag indicating if the reminder is an all day reminder.

userIds.description: Array of unique identifier of the users of the reminder.

versionId.description: Unique version identifier of the expense.

createdByUserId.description: Unique identifier of the user that created the expense.

staff.description: The staff member associated to the expense.

matter.description: The matter associated to the expense.

invoice.description: The invoice associated to the expense.

invoiceId.description: Unique identifier of the associated invoice.

activityCode.description: The activity code associated to the expense.

utbmsTaskCode.description: The UTBMS task code associated to the expense, where UTBMS is enabled. Only applicable in US.

subject.description: The subject - this should be a short description of the expense.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the expense.

costType.description:
The cost type of the expense.

* Hard - Direct cost such as travel, accommodation, or materials.

* Soft - Indirect cost such as administrative fees or overhead.

quantity.description:
The quantity of the expense in units (if not applicable, use 1).

The expense amount will be calculated as Quantity * Price.

price.description:
The price of the expense in dollars. Limited to 2 decimal places (cents).

The expense amount will be calculated as Quantity * Price.

amount.description:
Total amount of the expense. Calculated as Price * Quantity.

This amount ignores GST (if applicable). See AmountExcTax and AmountIncTax.

amountExcTax.description:
Amount excluding tax. Calculated from Amount and Tax depending on the TaxInclusive property.

If tax is not applicable (outside AU), this will be the same as Amount.

amountIncTax.description:
Amount including tax. Calculated from Amount and Tax depending on the TaxInclusive property.

If tax is not applicable (outside AU), this will be the same as Amount.

tax.description: GST amount of the expense in dollars. Only applicable in AU.

outputTax.description:
Output tax amount of the expense in dollars. Only applicable in AU and UK regions.

When TaxOutOfScope or TaxZeroRated is true, this value must be 0.
When TaxExempt is true, this value can be greater than 0.

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is GST inclusive, otherwise GST exclusive. Only applicable in AU.

GST inclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount - GST, Amount inc. GST = Amount.

GST exclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount, Amount inc. GST = Amount + GST.
(Amount = Price * Quantity, GST = value of the Tax field)

taxZeroRated.description: True if the expense is zero-rated for tax purposes.

taxOutOfScope.description: True if the expense is out of scope for tax purposes.

taxExempt.description: True if the expense is exempt from tax.

finalized.description: True if the expense has been finalized.

isWrittenOff.description:
True if the expense is written off. True only allowed if IsBillable is true. 

Written off expenses will show on an invoice with their amount, but will not be counted in the invoice total.

isBillable.description: True if the expense is billable. Non-billable expense will, by default, not be shown on invoices (and, if shown, the amount will be 0).

isInvoicedExternally.description: True if the expense is invoiced externally.

isDeleted.description: True if the expense is deleted.

updatedByUserId.description:
Unique identifier of the user updating the expense.

This field is reserved for server-to-server operations.

staffId.description:
Unique identifier of the associated staff member.

When StaffId is not provided, the API will attempt to match your User Id to a Staff Id automatically.

invoiceId.description: Unique identifier of the associated invoice.

activityCode.description: The activity code associated to the expense.

subject.description: The subject - this should be a short description of the expense.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the expense.

costType.description:
The cost type of the expense.

* Hard - Direct cost such as travel, accommodation, or materials.

* Soft - Indirect cost such as administrative fees or overhead.

quantity.description:
The quantity of the expense in units (if not applicable, use 1).

The expense amount will be calculated as Quantity * Price.

price.description:
The price of the expense in dollars. Limited to 2 decimal places (cents).

The expense amount will be calculated as Quantity * Price.

tax.description:
Tax amount of the expense in dollars. Only applicable in AU and UK regions.

When TaxOutOfScope or TaxExempt is true, this value must be 0.
When TaxZeroRated is true, this value can be greater than 0.

outputTax.description:
Output tax amount of the expense in dollars. Only applicable in AU and UK regions.

When TaxOutOfScope or TaxZeroRated is true, this value must be 0.
When TaxExempt is true, this value can be greater than 0.

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is tax inclusive, otherwise tax exclusive. Only applicable in AU and UK regions.

Tax inclusive means: Amount exc. tax = Amount - Tax, Amount inc. tax = Amount.

Tax exclusive means: Amount exc. tax = Amount, Amount inc. tax = Amount + Tax.
(Amount = Price * Quantity, Tax = value of the Tax field)

This field is mutually exclusive with TaxZeroRated, TaxOutOfScope and TaxExempt.

taxZeroRated.description:
True if the expense is zero-rated for tax purposes. Only supported in UK regions.

This field is mutually exclusive with TaxInclusive, TaxOutOfScope and TaxExempt.
When true, OutputTax must be 0.

taxOutOfScope.description:
True if the expense is out of scope for tax purposes. Only supported in UK regions.

This field is mutually exclusive with TaxInclusive, TaxZeroRated and TaxExempt.
When true, both Tax and OutputTax must be 0.

taxExempt.description:
True if the expense is exempt from tax.

This field is mutually exclusive with TaxInclusive, TaxZeroRated and TaxOutOfScope.
When true, Tax must be 0 but OutputTax can be greater than 0.

finalized.description: True if the expense has been finalized.

isWrittenOff.description:
True if the expense is written off. True only allowed if IsBillable is true. 

Written off expenses will show on an invoice with their amount, but will not be counted in the invoice total.

isBillable.description: True if the expense is billable. Non-billable expense will, by default, not be shown on invoices (and, if shown, the amount will be 0).

isInvoicedExternally.description: True if the expense is invoiced externally.

assignToFirmOwner.description:
Assigns expense to a firm owner if true. Ignored if a StaffId is provided.

Note: If there are multiple firm owners, it is not guaranteed that the same firm owner will be assigned everytime.

matter.description: The matter associated to the fee.

staff.description: The staff member associated to the fee.

activityCode.description: The activity code associated to the fee.

utbmsTaskCode.description: The UTBMS task code associated to the fee, where UTBMS is enabled. Only applicable in US.

subject.description: The subject - this should be a short description of the fee.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the fee.

feeType.description: The type of the fee (Fixed = 0, Time = 1).

finalized.description: True if the fee has been finalized.

isInvoicedExternally.description: True if the fee is invoiced externally.

isWrittenOff.description:
True if the fee is written off. True only allowed if IsBillable is true.

Written off fee will show on an invoice with their amount, but will not be counted in the invoice total.

isBillable.description: True if the fee is billable. Non-billable fee will, by default, not be shown on invoices (and, if shown, the amount will be 0).

tax.description: GST amount of the fee in dollars. Only applicable in AU.

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is GST inclusive, otherwise GST exclusive. Only applicable in AU.

GST inclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount - GST, Amount inc. GST = Amount.

GST exclusive means: Amount exc. GST = Amount, Amount inc. GST = Amount + GST.

taxExempt.description: True if the fee is tax exempt. In that case, Tax will always be 0.

taxOutOfScope.description: True if the fee is out of scope for tax. In that case, Tax will always be 0.

rate.description: The rate of the fee in dollars.

amount.description:
Total amount of the fee in dollars. Calculated using Rate and Duration depending on the fee type.

This amount includes tax depending on the TaxInclusive property. See AmountExcTax and AmountIncTax.

amountExcTax.description:
Amount excluding tax in dollars. Calculated from Amount and Tax depending on the TaxInclusive property.

If tax is not applicable (outside AU), this will be the same as Amount.

amountIncTax.description:
Amount including tax in dollars. Calculated from Amount and Tax depending on the TaxInclusive property.

If tax is not applicable (outside AU), this will be the same as Amount.

billableAmountExcTax.description:
Billable amount excluding tax in dollars. If fee is billable, value will be the same as AmountExcTax. If it's non-billable,
value will be 0.

If the fee is partially billable (i.e. has source items, some of which are billable and some not),
this value will contain the amount calculated from billable items only.

billableTax.description:
Billable tax in dollars. If fee is billable, value will be the same as Tax. If it's non-billable,
value will be 0.

If the fee is partially billable (i.e. has source items, some of which are billable
and some not), this value will contain the tax calculated from billable items only.
In all other cases, the value will be the same as Tax.

isDeleted.description: True if the fee is deleted.

sourceItems.description: The source items on the fee.

createdFromActivityId.description: Unique identifier of the Activity used to create the fee, if applicable.

updatedByUserId.description:
Unique identifier of the user updating the fee.

This field is reserved for server-to-server operations.

staffId.description:
Unique identifier of the associated staff member.

When StaffId is not provided, the API will attempt to match your User Id to a Staff Id automatically.

invoiceId.description: Unique identifier of the associated invoice.

activityCode.description: The activity code associated to the fee.

feeType.description: The type of the fee (Fixed = 0, Time = 1).

subject.description: The subject - this should be a short description of the fee.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the fee.

duration.description: The duration billed - in minutes. This duration is used if there are no sub activities.

durationWorked.description: The duration worked - in minutes. This duration is used if there are no sub activities.

rate.description: The rate of the fee in dollars.

tax.description:
Tax amount of the fee in dollars. Only applicable in AU and UK regions.

When TaxOutOfScope or TaxExempt is true, this value must be 0.

taxInclusive.description:
If true, the amount is tax inclusive, otherwise tax exclusive. Only applicable in AU and UK regions.

Tax inclusive means: Amount exc. tax = Amount - Tax, Amount inc. tax = Amount.

Tax exclusive means: Amount exc. tax = Amount, Amount inc. tax = Amount + Tax.

(Amount = Rate for fixed fees, or Rate * Duration for time fees, Tax = value of the Tax field)

taxExempt.description:
True if the fee is exempt from tax.

This field is mutually exclusive with TaxOutOfScope.
When true, Tax must be 0.

taxOutOfScope.description:
True if the fee is out of scope for tax purposes. Only supported in UK regions.

This field is mutually exclusive with TaxExempt.
When true, Tax must be 0.

finalized.description: True if the fee has been finalized.

isWrittenOff.description:
True if the fee is written off. True only allowed if IsBillable is true.

Written off fee will show on an invoice with their amount, but will not be counted in the invoice total.

isBillable.description: True if the fee is billable. Non-billable fee will, by default, not be shown on invoices (and, if shown, the amount will be 0).

isInvoicedExternally.description: True if the fee is invoiced externally.

sourceItems.description: The source items on the fee.

createdFromActivityId.description:
Associates an existing activity id to a fee.
Only valid for Fee creation. 
Value is supplied by Smokeball for some partners.

isBillable.description: True if the fee source item is billable.
True if the fee source item is billable.

productId.description:
The product/tier the firm is subscribed to. Must be set when creating the firm and is optional when updating the firm.

The supported products are listed in order below, the identifier (in brackets) must be used.

* Bill (SMK001)

* Boost (SMK004)

* Grow (SMK002)

* Prosper + (SMK003)

Possible values: SMK001, SMK004, SMK002, SMK003

addOnIds.description:
The optional add-ons the firm is subscribed to. Must be specified with an accompanying productId.

The supported add-ons are listed below, the identifier (listed in brackets) must be used.

* Intake (ADD001)

* AutoTime (ADD003)

* FamilyPro (ADD004)

* Api (ADD005)

* Workflows (ADD006)

* PowerBI (ADD007)

* Archie (ADD008)

* SSO (ADD010)

Possible values: ADD01, ADD003, ADD004, ADD005, ADD006, ADD007, ADD008, ADD010

acn.description:

contact.description: Hypermedia link of the associated contact.

type.description:
The type of discount applied to the invoice.

Fixed for a fixed amount, or Percentage for a percentage-based discount.

Possible values: Fixed = 0, Percentage = 1.

fixedDiscount.description:
The fixed discount amount to be subtracted from the invoice total.

Only applicable when Type is Fixed.

percentage.description:
The percentage discount to be applied to the invoice total.

Only applicable when Type is Percentage.

Expressed as a number between 0 and 100.

description.description: A description of the discount, such as the reason or category.

id.description: The unique identifier of the invoice.

versionId.description: The unique identifier representing the current version of the invoice.

matter.description: A link to the matter associated with the invoice.

matterId.description: The unique identifier of the matter this invoice belongs to.

lastUpdatedByUserId.description: The unique identifier of the user who last updated the invoice.

description.description: A short description of the invoice contents or purpose.

status.description:
The status of the invoice.

Possible values: Draft = 0, Final = 1, Paid = 2, Deleted = 3 or Void = 4.

invoiceNumber.description: The sequential number assigned to the invoice.

invoiceTitle.description: The main title of the invoice.

invoiceTitleLine2.description: The optional second line of the invoice title.

issuedDate.description: The date the invoice was issued.

dueDate.description: The date by which payment for the invoice is due.

paidDate.description:
The date the invoice was fully paid.

Only populated if the invoice has been paid in full.

discount.description:
The discount configuration for the invoice (e.g., fixed or percentage).

See InvoiceTotals.Discount for the actual amount discounted.

surcharge.description: The surcharge configuration for the invoice (e.g., fixed or percentage).

debtors.description: The list of debtors associated with this invoice.

entries.description: The individual entries (fees or expenses) included in the invoice.

waived.description: Indicates whether the invoice has been waived.

invoiceTotals.description: The calculated totals for the invoice, including billed, paid, unpaid, tax, interest, discounts, etc.

invoiceId.description: Unique identifier of the requested invoice

versionId.description: Unique identifier of the invoice version

expiry.description: Expiry date/time when the download link is no longer accessible

InvoiceStatus.description:
The status of the invoice.

Possible values: Draft = 0, Final = 1, Paid = 2, Deleted = 3 or Void = 4.

paid.description: The total amount that has been paid towards the invoice.

billed.description:
The total amount billed on the invoice, excluding tax and interest.

This includes all fees and expenses before discounts or write-offs.

unpaid.description: The remaining amount due on the invoice, including any unpaid tax or interest.

unpaidExcInterest.description:
The total unpaid amount excluding interest.

If this value is zero on an interest-bearing invoice, it indicates the principal has been fully paid,
although interest may still be outstanding.

writtenOff.description: The total amount that has been written off from the invoice and is no longer expected to be paid.

waived.description:
The total amount that has been waived on the invoice.

Waived amounts are not charged but are also not written off.

discount.description:
The total amount discounted on the invoice.

This includes all applied discounts reducing the billed amount.

total.description: The grand total for the invoice, including tax and interest, before any payments, discounts, or write-offs.

tax.description: The total tax amount applied to the invoice.

interest.description: The total interest charged on the invoice, regardless of what has been paid so far.

feeTotal.description: The total amount of all fees on the invoice, including both written off and non-written off fees.

writtenOffFeeTotal.description: The total amount of fees that have been written off.

expenseTotal.description: The total amount of all expenses on the invoice, including both written off and non-written off expenses.

writtenOffExpenseTotal.description: The total amount of expenses that have been written off.

type.description:
Type of the activity.

Possible values: Fixed = '0', Time = '1', Expense = '2'

The type of surcharge applied to the invoice.

Possible values: None = 0, Fixed = 1, Percentage = 2.

fixedSurcharge.description:
The fixed surcharge amount applied to the invoice total.

Only applicable when Type is Fixed.

description.description: A description of the surcharge, such as the reason or category.

applyTo.description:
The surcharge application type, indicating what the surcharge applies to.

Possible values: None = 0, Fees = 1, Expenses = 2, FeesAndExpenses = 3.

The url that is called to request the plugin endpoint.

When a user views a plugin, we request the url to view securely through your backend.

Matter and user information is passed to the endpoint through POST body, and the endpoint is expected to return a JSON object containing a url field.
The plugin will then load the URL and display it to the user.

The subscription cancellation type.

* None - No cancellation type has been set.

* PeriodEnd - Cancel subscription at the end of the billing cycle.

* Immediate - Cancel subscription immediately.

* Date - Cancel at specified date - see 'CancelAt'.

cancelAt.description:
Optional date used to cancel at the supplied date. Will only be used if CancellationType is set to 'Date'.

If set to a date before the current period ends, this will cause a proration if prorations have been enabled.

If set during a future period, this will always cause a proration for that period.

cancelSubscription.description: Optional flag to force cancellation of the subscription instead of applying default cancellation behaviour.

reason.description: Optional reason for cancellation of the subscription.

Optional flag to preview cancellation request. 

If 'true', the Subscription is not cancelled and the CancellationType and CancellationDate are returned.
True if this is a cancellation preview.

* Cancel - Standard behaviour. The subscription will be canceled as normal.

* CancelTrials - Any trials applied to the subscription will be canceled.

Current billing interval of the subscription. 

Derived from the tiers billing interval. Returns 'None' if a tier is not associated to this subscription.

Currently only Monthly and Yearly are supported.

Possible values: None, Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Yearly.

quantity.description: The number of user licenses for this subscription.

createdDate.description: The created date of the subscription.

trialStatus.description:
The trial status of the subscription.

* None - The subscription is not trialing a tier or add-on.

* Trialing - The subscription is in its trial phase (on signup) or a promotion is applied and a tier or add-on is being trialed.

trialPeriodStartDate.description:
The trial period start date of the subscription.

Used in conjuction with the trial period end date to determine if the subscription is currently in trial mode.

Null if the subscription is not in trial mode.

trialPeriodEndDate.description:
The trial period end date of the subscription.

Used in conjuction with the trial period start date to determine if the subscription is currently in trial mode.

Null if the subscription is not in trial mode.

currentPeriodStartDate.description: The start date of the subscription.

currentPeriodEndDate.description: The end date of the subscription.

cancellationStatus.description:
The cancellation status of the subscription.

* None - The subscription is not canceled and no cancelation requests have been made.
            
* Pending - The subscription has been canceled and will be canceled at a later date.
            
* Canceled - The subscription has been canceled.

Possible values: None, Pending, Canceled.

cancellationType.description:
Represents the most recent cancellation type for the subscription.

This can be used alongside the CanceledAt and CancelAt properties to determine the cancellation status and timing.

* PeriodEnd - Subscription will be canceled at the end of the billing cycle.

* Immediate - Subscription was canceled immediatly. 

* Date - If not already canceled, the subscription will be canceled at the 'CancelAt' date.

Possible values: PeriodEnd, Immediate, Date.

canceledAt.description:
If the subscription has been canceled, the date of that cancellation.

Otherwise, the date of the cancel request.

cancelAt.description: A date in the future at which the subscription will automatically get canceled and the status will change to 'Canceled'.

type.description:
The subscription change type.

* Updated

* AddOnAdded

* AddOnRemoved

* PromotionApplied

* PromotionRemoved

* Canceled

* Resumed

* PaymentMethodAdded

* PaymentMethodRemoved

* PaymentMethodSetAsDefault

* QuantityUpdated

* Created

* Advanced

name.description: Name of the field that was changed or the type of change that was made

value.description: The value of the change, which can be a string representation of the new value or a JSON object for complex changes.

promotion.description: The promotion associated with the discount.

activationDate.description: The date the discount was activated.

expirationDate.description: The date the discount will expire.

total.description: The total amount for the invoice.

preTaxCredit.description: Total pre-tax credits applied to this payment.

lineItems.description: The line items associated to the invoice.

createdDate.description: The created date of the invoice.

product.description:
The tier or add-on this item is associated to.

Returns nothing if the product is not known by our system.

amount.description: The amount charged for this line item.

tax.description: The tax amount in this line item.

preTaxCredit.description: Any credit amount on this line item.

quantity.description: The number of users for this line item.

immediateProrationPayment.description: The prorated invoice preview for subscription changes that take effect immediately.

nextBillingCyclePayment.description: The preview of the next full billing cycle invoice for the updated subscription.

quantity.description: The number of users on the subscription.

productSuite.description: The product suite that this promotion belongs to.

tiers.description:
List of tiers this promotion can be applied to.
If tiers and add-ons are both empty, the promotion can be applied to any tier or add-on.

addOns.description:
List of add-ons this promotion can be applied to.
If tiers and add-ons are both empty, the promotion can be applied to any tier or add-on.

items.description:
The usage context of a promotion.

The context can be used by apps to determine how and when to apply a promotion.

usage.description:
Intended usage type for this promotion.

* Manual - Promotion can be applied manually at any time (with a code).

* Trial - The promotion can be used for trialing tiers or add-ons.

* CancelRetention - The promotion can be used when the user is trying to cancel their subscription.

* DowngradeRetention - The promotion can be used when the user is trying to downgrade their subscription.

* Signup - The promotion can be used on sign up.

durationDays.description:
Number of days the promotion applies for.

For example, if the promotion is a trial promotion, how many days the associated tier or add-on will be trialed for.

amountOff.description:
Fixed amount off (in cents).
Only one of AmountOff or PercentOff will be set.

percentOff.description:
Percentage discount.
Only one of AmountOff or PercentOff will be set.

active.description: Whether the promotion is currently valid and can be applied.

numUsed.description: Number of times this promotion has been used.

expirationDate.description:
When the promotion expires.
Null if the promotion does not expire.

codes.description: List of promotion codes associated with this promotion.

metadata.description: Additional metadata associated with the promotion code.

isPersistent.description:
Whether the promotion persists across tier switches.

For example, if a BILL only promotion is applied to the subscription and the firm upgrades to BOOST, the Promotion should be deactivated.

* If the promotion is non-persistent, it should be removed completely.

* If the promotion is persistent and the firm reverts back to BILL at a later date, the promotion should automatically be reactivated.

isFree.description: Whether this promotion makes the targeted tier or add-on free.

deleted.description: Whether this promotion has been deleted.

behaviour.description: The behavior set on Tax Rate.

TaxRateBehavior.description: The behavior set on Tax Rate.

smokeballId.description:
Unique Smokeball identifier of the tier. 

This identifier convenience purposes only and should not be used to interact with the subscriptions API.

productSuite.description: The product suite that this tier belongs to.

name.description: The display name of the tier.

description.description:
The description of the tier.

Can be used to describe the tier to a customer.

trialPeriodDays.description:
The number of days the tier can be trialed for.

Cannot be trialed if zero or missing.

prices.description: The price options for the tier.

createdDate.description: The created date of the tier.

updatedDate.description: The updated date of the tier.

smokeballId.description:
Unique Smokeball identifier of the tier. 

This identifier convenience purposes only and should not be used to interact with the subscriptions API.

productSuite.description: The product suite that this tier belongs to.

name.description: The display name of the tier.

description.description:
The description of the tier.

Can be used to describe the tier to a customer.

trialPeriodDays.description:
The number of days the tier can be trialed for.

Cannot be trialed if zero or missing.

prices.description: The price options for the tier.

createdDate.description: The created date of the tier.

updatedDate.description: The updated date of the tier.

cancellationStatus.description:
The cancellation status of the trial.

* None - The trial has not been canceled. If a payment method is added to the subscription, the trial product(s) will be applied to the subscription at expiration.
            
* Pending -  The trial has been canceled. The trial product(s) will not be applied to the subscription at expiration.

Possible values: None, Pending.

activationDate.description: The date the trial was activated.

expirationDate.description: The date the trial will expire.

tierId.description:
Optional tier id to subscribe to.

An error is thrown if the supplied or existing add-ons are not valid for the supplied tier id.

addOnIds.description:
Optional add-on ids to subscribe to.

An error is thrown if the supplied or existing add-ons are not valid for the existing or supplied tier id.

interval.description:
Optional billing interval/pricing option to use when setting subscription tier.

If an interval is not supplied then the default interval option will be used.

If an interval is supplied but a tier is not supplied, the existing tier is used and the interval is changed.

reason.description: Optional reason for changing the subscription tier.

DocumentType.description:
Available document types: "File = 0", "FormTemplate = 1", "Memo = 2" 

The FormTemplate (1) document type is not currently supported for task document creation.

createdBy.description: The staff member who created the subtask.

completedBy.description: The staff member who completed the subtask.

lastUpdatedBy.description: The staff member who last updated the subtask.

subject.description: The subject - a short description of the subtask.

isCompleted.description: True when the subtask is completed.

isDeleted.description: True when the subtask is deleted.

staffId.description: Unique identifier of the associated staff member creating or updating the subtask.

completedByStaffId.description: Unique identifier of the associated staff member who completed the subtask.

isCompleted.description: True when the subtask is completed.

completedDate.description:
Completed date of the subtask. 
If not provided and IsCompleted is set to true, the current date will be used.

SubTaskDto.description: Data transfer object for a subtask.

parentTask.description: The parent task associated to this task. Id is missing if this task is not a sub task.

createdBy.description: The staff member who created the task.

completedBy.description: The staff member who completed the task.

lastUpdatedBy.description: The staff member who last updated the task.

assignees.description: The staff member(s) assigned to the task.

subTasks.description: The tasks associated to the task.

subject.description: The subject - a short description of the task.

note.example: Contract needs to be reviewed and discussed with John

dueDate.description: The due date of the task.

isCompleted.description: True when the task is completed.

isDeleted.description: True when the task is deleted.

duration.description: Duration of the task in ISO 8601 duration format.

type.description:
The type of the document.

Possible values: File = 0, FormTemplate = 1, Memo = 2.

isDeleted.description: True when the task document has been deleted.

documentId.description:
Unique identifier of the document (file or memo).

If a file, the type must be 0 (File). 

If a memo, the type must be 2 (Memo).

The FormTemplate (1) document type is not currently supported for task document creation.

type.description:
The type of the document.

Possible values: File = 0, FormTemplate = 1, Memo = 2.

The FormTemplate (1) document type is not currently supported for task document creation.

TaskDocumentDto.description: Data transfer object for a task document.

matterId.description: Unique identifier of the matter associated to the task.

staffId.description: Unique identifier of the associated staff member creating or updating the task.

completedByStaffId.description: Unique identifier of the associated staff member completing the task.

assigneeIds.description: Unique identifier(s) of the associated staff member(s) assigned to the task.

subject.description: The subject - this should be a short description of the task.

note.example: Contract needs to be reviewed and discussed with John

isCompleted.description: True when the task is completed.

duration.description: Duration of the task in ISO 8601 duration format.

isInternal.description: Returns true if the user is flagged as an internal user.

bypassMfa.description: Returns true if multi-factor authentication is bypassed for the user.

password.description:
Password for the user.

Password must include atleast one lowercase character, uppercase character, numeric character as well as a special character.

expireAfterDays.description: Expire after the specified days. Must be left blank for users that do not expire.

isInternal.description:
Creates the user as an internal user.

Internal users are excluded from billing and license counts.

Use this option for testing, background services, or other non-customer-facing purposes.

bypassMfa.description:
Bypasses multi-factor authentication for the user.

When enabled, the user will not be prompted for two factor authentication during login.

accountId.description: Unique identifier of the associated account.

name.description: Name or description of the subscription.
name.example: Listen to matter and contact changes

eventTypes.description: The event types that the webhook subscription is subscribed to.

eventNotificationUrl.description: The uri to notify when an event has occurred.

updatedDateUtc.description: The webhook subscription last updated date.

key.description: Unique key used for creating signature header in webhook notification requests.

name.description: Name or description of the webhook subscription.
name.example: Listen to matter and contact changes

eventTypes.description: The event types that the webhook subscription should be subscribed to.
